files.help:
Set this in your zshrc:

```bash
zstyle ':completion:*' cache-path "$XDG_CACHE_HOME"/zsh/zcompcache
```

Set this in your zshrc:

```bash
compinit -d "$XDG_CACHE_HOME"/zsh/zcompdump-"$ZSH_VERSION"
```

Set this in your zshrc:

```bash
export HISTFILE="$XDG_STATE_HOME"/zsh/history
```

Set this in your zshrc:

```bash
export HISTFILE="$XDG_STATE_HOME"/zsh/history
```

Set this in your zshrc:

```bash
export HISTFILE="$XDG_STATE_HOME"/zsh/history
```

Move the file to _"$HOME"/.config/zsh/.zlogin_ and export the following environment variable:

```bash
export ZDOTDIR="$HOME"/.config/zsh
```
You can do this in _/etc/zshenv_ (Or _/etc/zsh/zshenv_, on some distros).

Move the file to _"$HOME"/.config/zsh/.zprofile_ and export the following environment variable:

```bash
export ZDOTDIR="$HOME"/.config/zsh
```
You can do this in _/etc/zshenv_ (Or _/etc/zsh/zshenv_, on some distros).

Move the file to _"$HOME"/.config/zsh/.zshenv_ and export the following environment variable:

```bash
export ZDOTDIR="$HOME"/.config/zsh
```
You can do this in _/etc/zshenv_ (Or _/etc/zsh/zshenv_, on some distros).

Move the file to _"$HOME"/.config/zsh/.zshrc_ and export the following environment variable:

```bash
export ZDOTDIR="$HOME"/.config/zsh
```
You can do this in _/etc/zshenv_ (Or _/etc/zsh/zshenv_, on some distros).
